name: Two chained spheres
description:
The controls are

  • WSAD for the blue ball
  • arrows and 0 for red ball
  • Esc for in-game menu.

This is my first "full" game so please be kind to me.

I'm dumdum so I forgot to pack the UnityPlayer, CrashHandler and MonoBleedingEdge... Please get this into folder with your unpacked game.
